text:
Seeq | Back-end / Full-stack Engineer | 100% REMOTE | No VISAs | US/CANADA only

Seeq (www.seeq.com) is a VC-funded startup targeting data analysis in industrial markets. We are 100% remote. You can work anywhere in the US and Canada (we're staying in compatible timezones for now). We use a variety of collaboration tools, like Sococo and Slack, which makes us feel like weâ€™re in the same building together.

If you're a talented back-end / full-stack engineer that wants to work on building and scaling a powerful data processing and analysis product, check out our posting here: https://www.seeq.com/about/careers#op-18609-back-end--full-s...

TECHNOLOGY STACK

- Java / JVM languages

- Cassandra

- Tinkerpop 3 / Titan Graph Database

- Elasticsearch

- Spark (soon)

- Node.js

- AngularJS
